description: This file defines a React functional component 'EditorPanel' that provides a user interface for editing video template settings, user profile details, project entries, and theme-related color options in a portfolio video builder application. It also exports associated types and default state objects.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the 'template' or 'background' field in the editor state.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates a specific field within the user's profile in the editor state.

methods.name: addProject
methods.description: Adds a new project entry to the user's profile projects array.

methods.name: removeProject
methods.description: Removes a project at a specified index from the projects array.

methods.name: updateProject
methods.description: Updates a specific project in the projects array based on index and provided patch data.
